entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
